pageContext.claim: “And I was here on Christmas, and I was here. My family was in Florida. I said, go to Florida. And I didn’t even find it to be a lonely place.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was not alone in the White House on Christmas Eve, or on Christmas. First lady Melania Trump cut short a trip to Florida to join the president in Washington from Christmas Eve onward. They flew together to visit U.S. troops in Iraq on Dec. 26.
